text:
The bird park has moved but I'm sure they will replace it with something worthy.

Jurong Bird Park in Singapore is a paradise for nature enthusiasts and families alike. The park's breathtaking aviaries house an astounding array of colorful and exotic bird species from around the world. The immersive and well-designed exhibits allow visitors to observe these magnificent creatures up close and even partake in interactive feeding sessions. From majestic eagles to playful penguins, the diverse collection is awe-inspiring. The park's commitment to conservation and education shines through its informative shows and exhibits. A day at Jurong Bird Park is an unforgettable experience, leaving visitors with a deeper appreciation for the beauty and diversity of avian life.
Very beautifully designed park with beautiful fauna. Worth a visit! There's a children water park and outdoor playground area. Bring extra clothes.

A great place where kids and adults all will enjoy. Many different kinds of beautiful birds, several shows at different times which should not be missed. A nice food court with eating options but not much for the vegetarians. The parrots feeding is a lot of fun since they come and sit on you, get photo opportunities. It has been kept very nice and neat. The restrooms are very clean. A good family outing

Jurong Bird Park is a fantastic destination for bird enthusiasts, offering an opportunity to see an impressive collection of over 400 bird species from around the world, including many endangered species. The park's well-designed habitats, informative shows, and interactive experiences, such as feeding the birds, make it an enjoyable and educational experience for visitors of all ages.
A beautiful place to visit in Singapore. This place is clean and very well maintained. It has various exotic birds and a lot of greenery around them.
